creator: MOIA
descriptionHtml:
Starting 25 May we will be back in Hamburg at the usual service times. We are also expanding our service area into Billstedt and Billbrook.

For your safety on board as well as for our employees and staff, we will maintain the protective measures as operating procedures:
● Guests in our vehicles will still be required to wear masks.
● Passenger area and driver's area are separated by protective foil.
● There are short cleaning intervals of the vehicles, and disinfectants are available in the vehicles.
● Pooling of passengers will initially be limited to a maximum of five individuals.
● At our depots, all operational staff and drivers are required to wear masks.
● Implementation of employee training courses on infection prevention will take place in advance of regular operations.
● Adapted safety protocols at our depots, i.e. introduction of distance lines on the floors of the depots.
● In addition, the depots are segregated operationally in line with social distancing rules.

Take MOIA to get across Hamburg and Hanover. To the train station, to go shopping or to the most important places in the city – book your trip comfortably with the app and pay with credit card, with PayPal or Apple Pay as well. Your MOIA will take you there quickly and safely, allowing you to relax. Without transfers, searching for a parking space, or making any detours. And with comfortable privacy seats, WLAN and USB connections. You share your trip with up to 5 other people. Of course, the app will tell you in advance what it costs, where you'll be picked up and when you’ll arrive. You’ll save yourself stress and reduce traffic for everyone else. This is how it works:

● Download the MOIA App and create an account
● Enter your starting point and destination in Hamburg or Hanover
● Add Credit Card, PayPal or Google Pay Account
● Request a ride and book it
● Get picked up at your nearest pick-up point
● Share the transport, help reduce traffic, and save money

What makes it so awesome?
Easy: MOIA is simple and clever. Up to 6 people traveling in the same direction share a ride and thus reduce traffic. So sit back and enjoy the good feeling of knowing to help your environment. Because every trip you take makes your city a bit more liveable – whether on your way to work, to a downtown shopping trip or to parks for outdoor activities.

One MOIA, with benefits for everyone:

● Relaxed, easy and smooth journeys
● Privacy seats, WLAN, USB ports
● Travel through Hamburg quietly and 100% electric
● No stress, no searching for a parking space
● Easy with the app and from almost everywhere
● Price and estimated arrival time before booking
● Pick-up point close to you, short waiting time, and no transfer

MOIA is available in Hamburg. Follow us on Facebook, Twitter, or Instagram and be one of the first to know about the MOIA launch in other cities.

Have any questions? You can reach us at customer@service.moia.io

title: MOIA - Ridesharing in Hamburg and Hanover

creator: MOIA
descriptionHtml:
We currently have extensive safety measures in place - on board and in our depots - so that you always travel safely in our MOIAs.

• Masks required for passengers aged 7 and up
• Free disinfecting wipes in every MOIA
• All vehicles cleaned regularly
• Partition between passenger cabin and driver space
• Maximum of five passengers allowed
• Masks required for depot workers
• All staff receive extensive infection-prevention training
• Adapted safety precautions at depots (e.g., with distance markings)

MOIA brings you comfortably to your destination in Hamburg or Hanover : to the central station, train, hotel, or most important places to see in the city. Leave your car elsewhere, book your ride with our convenient app, and pay by credit card, PayPal, or Apple Pay. If you travel by bicycle or scooter already, you’ll find the perfect zero-emission alternative with the fully electric MOIA shuttle. More convenient than public transport, no hunting for a car park, and no unnecessary detours, enjoy comfortable and private seats, Wi-Fi, and USB ports for charging your devices. Unlike a cab, you share your ride with up to four other passengers – which lets you travel at an exceptionally low price. The app of course tells you in advance how much it costs, where you’ll be picked up, and when you’re expected to arrive. You’ll save yourself stress and reduce traffic for everyone else.

How it works:

• Download the MOIA app and sign up.
• Enter your starting point and destination.
• Add a credit card or PayPal or Apple Pay account.
• Request and book a ride.
• Get picked up at a stop near you.
• Share the journey, help reduce traffic, and save money.


What’s so great about it?

Easy: Up to six (currently: five) people heading in the same direction travel together. This is analternative to train, bus, metro, car sharing, taxi, and rental car, helping reduce congestion. So, lean back and enjoy the nice feeling of doing a little something for the environment with every ride through the city. Every trip you take helps make Hamburg and Hanover a bit more livable, whether on your way to work, the airport, the train station, the zoo, or Hamburg’s port. This is how transport is turned into mobility! And how the future of sharing becomes relevant for everyone.


One MOIA, with benefits for all:

• Arrive relaxed, in comfort, and safely
• Private seats, Wi-Fi, and USB ports for charging your devices
• Quiet and fully electric journeys across town
• No stress, no transfers, and no looking for a car park
• Zero emissions and zero CO2 for your city
• Easy and app-based, available from (almost) anywhere
• You’re told your fare and ETA before booking
• Stops near you, short wait, and no transfers

You can ride with MOIA in Hamburg and Hanover currently. Follow us on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram and be one of the first to know when we launch in other cities.


Do you have a question or want to give us feedback? Send us an email at customer@service.moia.io

You love our app? Great, feel free to rate us! Your feedback is what keeps everyone running here at MOIA. Stay safe.

title: MOIA - Ridesharing in Hamburg and Hanover

creator: MOIA
descriptionHtml:
Our service is temporarily suspended!
Since Dec 24, our service has been suspended in Hamburg and Hanover. This is in response to the increasing numbers of infections and the decisions by the federal and state governments to further restrict public life. We will keep you updated, when speed will pick up again.


We currently have extensive safety measures in place - on board and in our depots - so that you always travel safely in our MOIAs.

• Masks required for passengers aged 7 and up
• Free disinfecting wipes in every MOIA
• All vehicles cleaned regularly
• Partition between passenger cabin and driver space
• Maximum of five passengers allowed
• Masks required for depot workers
• All staff receive extensive infection-prevention training
• Adapted safety precautions at depots (e.g., with distance markings)

MOIA brings you comfortably to your destination in Hamburg or Hanover: to the central station, train or most important places to see in the city and for your Christmas gifts shopping. Leave your car elsewhere, book your ride with our convenient app, and pay by credit card, PayPal, or Google Pay. If you travel by bicycle or scooter already, you’ll find the perfect zero-emission alternative with the fully electric MOIA shuttle. More convenient than public transport, no hunting for a car park, and no unnecessary detours, enjoy comfortable and private seats, Wi-Fi, and USB ports for charging your devices. Unlike a cab, you share your ride with up to four other passengers – which lets you travel at an exceptionally low price. The app of course tells you in advance how much it costs, where you’ll be picked up, and when you’re expected to arrive. You’ll save yourself stress and reduce traffic for everyone else.

How it works:

• Download the MOIA app and sign up.
• Enter your starting point and destination.
• Add a credit card or PayPal or Google Pay account.
• Request and book a ride.
• Get picked up at a stop near you.
• Share the journey, help reduce traffic, and save money.


What’s so great about it?

Easy: Up to six (currently: five) people heading in the same direction travel together. This is analternative to train, bus, metro, car sharing, taxi, and rental car, helping reduce congestion. So, lean back and enjoy the nice feeling of doing a little something for the environment with every ride through the city. Every trip you take helps make Hamburg and Hanover a bit more livable, whether on your way to work, the airport, the train station, the zoo, or Hamburg’s port. This is how transport is turned into mobility! And how the future of sharing becomes relevant for everyone.


One MOIA, with benefits for all:

• Arrive relaxed, in comfort, and safely
• Private seats, Wi-Fi, and USB ports for charging your devices
• Quiet and fully electric journeys across town
• No stress, no transfers, and no looking for a car park
• Zero emissions and zero CO2 for your city
• Easy and app-based, available from (almost) anywhere
• You’re told your fare and ETA before booking
• Stops near you, short wait, and no transfers

You can ride with MOIA in Hamburg and Hanover currently. Follow us on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram and be one of the first to know when we launch in other cities.


Do you have a question or want to give us feedback? Send us an email at customer@service.moia.io

title: MOIA - Ridesharing in Hamburg and Hanover

creator: MOIA
descriptionHtml:
We’ll be discontinuing our night service on May 09 on behalf of the city of Hamburg. Please remember that all passengers on board are required to wear a FFP2 mask.

Our regular service is temporarily suspended!
Since Dec 24, our service has been suspended in Hamburg and Hanover. This is in response to the increasing numbers of infections and the decisions by the federal and state governments to further restrict public life. We will keep you updated, when speed will pick up again.


We currently have extensive safety measures in place - on board and in our depots - so that you always travel safely in our MOIAs.
• Passengers aged 7 and above wear an FFP2 mask on board.
• We are also reducing the number of passengers to a maximum of 3 per MOIA.
• The passenger area in every MOIA is separated from the driver’s area by a protective film.
• The vehicles are cleaned regularly during service hours.
• Free disinfection wipes are waiting for you at pickup.
• Our drivers are regularly tested.

Our regular service is temporarily suspended!

• No stress, no transfers, and no looking for a car park
• Zero emissions and zero CO2 for your city
• Easy and app-based, available from (almost) anywhere
• You’re told your fare and ETA before booking
• Stops near you, short wait, and no transfers

You can ride with MOIA in Hamburg and Hanover currently. Follow us on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram and be one of the first to know when we launch in other cities.


Do you have a question or want to give us feedback? Send us an email at customer@service.moia.io
